entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Whiteshell
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
